actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that foreign travel reports shall be promptly transmitted by the Member or employee taking the trip to the chairman of the committee authorizing the trip, who shall transmit a copy of the report to the Congressional Record.

summary.text: Requires, pursuant to the Rules of the House of Representatives, reports by Members or House committee employees showing expenses of foreign travel financed by committee funds to be filed within ten calendar days after termination of such travel. Requires that such reports be transmitted to the Congressional Record for publication.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that foreign travel reports shall be promptly transmitted by the Member or employee taking the trip to the chairman of the committee authorizing the trip, who shall transmit a copy of the report to the Congressional Record.
